title: Ukraine Shoots Down 27 Russian Drones
content: Ukraine shot down 27 out of 44 Shahed-131 and Shahed-136 drones launched by Russia overnight, the Ukrainian Air Force said.
summary: Ukraine shot down 27 out of 44 Shahed-131 and Shahed-136 drones launched by Russia overnight, the Ukrainian Air Force said.

title: "Did Nothing Wrong": Trump Welcomes New York Sentencing Delay
content: Republican US presidential candidate Donald Trump on Friday welcomed a delay in his New York hush money fraud case that pushed sentencing on his 34 felony convictions until after the election.
summary: Republican US presidential candidate Donald Trump on Friday welcomed a delay in his New York hush money fraud case that pushed sentencing on his 34 felony convictions until after the election.

title: Speed Of Nepal Plane In July Crash Didn't Match Guidelines, Finds Probe
content: The small passenger plane involved in a crash that killed 18 people in Nepal in July was carrying a load and travelling at a speed that did not match guidelines at the time of the accident, a government-led investigation team said.
summary: The small passenger plane involved in a crash that killed 18 people in Nepal in July was carrying a load and travelling at a speed that did not match guidelines at the time of the accident, a government-led investigation team said.

title: French Mass Rape Suspect Among "Worst Sexual Criminals," Says Daughter
content: The daughter of a Frenchman on trial for enlisting strangers to rape his drugged wife Friday described him as "likely one of the worst sexual criminals in past 20 years".
summary: The daughter of a Frenchman on trial for enlisting strangers to rape his drugged wife Friday described him as "likely one of the worst sexual criminals in past 20 years".

title: Israeli Strikes Kill 27 Palestinians In Gaza As Polio Vaccination Resumes
content: Israeli military strikes killed at least 27 Palestinians across the Gaza Strip on Friday, medics said, as health officials resumed vaccination of tens of thousands more children in the enclave against polio.
summary: Israeli military strikes killed at least 27 Palestinians across the Gaza Strip on Friday, medics said, as health officials resumed vaccination of tens of thousands more children in the enclave against polio.

title: New York Judge Delays Donald Trump Hush Money Sentencing Until After Polls
content: The New York judge who presided over Donald Trump's hush money trial on Friday delayed sentencing until after November's US presidential election.
summary: The New York judge who presided over Donald Trump's hush money trial on Friday delayed sentencing until after November's US presidential election.

title: 17 Boys Killed, 70 Missing After Fire Breaks Out In Kenya School Dorm
content: At least 17 young boys were killed and 70 missing after a fire ripped through a primary school dormitory in central Kenya, officials said Friday, leaving distraught relatives desperate for news of their loved ones.
summary: At least 17 young boys were killed and 70 missing after a fire ripped through a primary school dormitory in central Kenya, officials said Friday, leaving distraught relatives desperate for news of their loved ones.

title: Israeli Troops Shoot Turkish-American Woman Dead At West Bank Protest
content: Israeli troops shot and killed a Turkish-American woman who had been taking part in a protest against settlement expansion in the Israeli-occupied West Bank on Friday, Palestinian and Turkish officials said.
summary: Israeli troops shot and killed a Turkish-American woman who had been taking part in a protest against settlement expansion in the Israeli-occupied West Bank on Friday, Palestinian and Turkish officials said.

title: Man Who Visited Every Country Had To Prove He's Not A Spy 4 Times
content: Indy Nelson, a seasoned American traveler, has visited every country in the world, often facing unique challenges along the way.
summary: Indy Nelson, a seasoned American traveler, has visited every country in the world, often facing unique challenges along the way.

title: Joe Biden Calls For Assault Weapons Ban After Yet Another US School Shooting
content: A day after a shooting incident in United State's Georgia left four people dead, US President Joe Biden has called for a complete ban on assault weapons.
summary: A day after a shooting incident in United State's Georgia left four people dead, US President Joe Biden has called for a complete ban on assault weapons.

title: Private Chat No Longer Safe? Telegram To Moderate After CEO's France Arrest
content: Following CEO Pavel Durov's arrest in France, Telegram has made changes to its privacy policies, removing an earlier commitment to protect user data from law enforcement.
summary: Following CEO Pavel Durov's arrest in France, Telegram has made changes to its privacy policies, removing an earlier commitment to protect user data from law enforcement.

title: Apple Event 2024: Everything To Expect From Apple's iPhone 16 Launch
content: Apple Inc.'s most important event of the year takes place Monday, when the company will roll out its latest iPhones and set the stage for a new artificial intelligence platform.
summary: Apple Inc.'s most important event of the year takes place Monday, when the company will roll out its latest iPhones and set the stage for a new artificial intelligence platform.

title: US-Iraq Deal Would See Hundreds Of Troops Withdraw In 1st Year: Report
content: The United States and Iraq have reached an understanding on plans for the withdrawal of US-led coalition forces from Iraq, according to multiple sources familiar with the matter.
summary: The United States and Iraq have reached an understanding on plans for the withdrawal of US-led coalition forces from Iraq, according to multiple sources familiar with the matter.

title: Pak Court Orders Removal Of Army General From Key Position In Rare Verdict
content: In a rare verdict, a Pakistani court on Friday ordered the removal of a serving general of the Pakistan Army from heading a key organisation.
summary: In a rare verdict, a Pakistani court on Friday ordered the removal of a serving general of the Pakistan Army from heading a key organisation.

title: Vladimir Putin Has 2 Sons With Ex Olympic Gymnast Alina Kabaeva: Report
content: A report by an investigative site reveals that Russian President Vladimir Putin has two sons with former Olympic gymnast Alina Kabaeva.
summary: A report by an investigative site reveals that Russian President Vladimir Putin has two sons with former Olympic gymnast Alina Kabaeva.

title: Watch: Trump Announces Major Role For Musk Should He Win The US Election
content: Donald Trump revealed his initial plans, should he be voted to power in the 2024 US presidential election. Mr Trump said he will set up a task force shortly after assuming office, aimed at conducting a thorough audit of the entire federal government.
summary: Donald Trump revealed his initial plans, should he be voted to power in the 2024 US presidential election. Mr Trump said he will set up a task force shortly after assuming office, aimed at conducting a thorough audit of the entire federal government.

title: Victims' Family Pardons Pak Industrialist's Wife Who Killed 2 With SUV
content: Relatives of a father-daughter duo have forgiven a female from a wealthy, influential Pakistani business family here who ran down a luxurious SUV over them, her lawyer said on Friday.
summary: Relatives of a father-daughter duo have forgiven a female from a wealthy, influential Pakistani business family here who ran down a luxurious SUV over them, her lawyer said on Friday.

title: Video: Asteroid Burns Up In Earth's Atmosphere, Lighting Up Philippine Sky
content: A small asteroid, 2024 RW1, burned up in Earth's atmosphere over Luzon Island, Philippines, after being discovered just hours earlier by astronomers in Arizona.
summary: A small asteroid, 2024 RW1, burned up in Earth's atmosphere over Luzon Island, Philippines, after being discovered just hours earlier by astronomers in Arizona.

title: Opinion: It's Time Pakistan Stopped Blaming Others For Its Balochistan Problem
content: Pakistan needs to abandon the policy of rewarding those who attack Baloch nationalists and stop promoting conspiracy theories that India, Iran, and Afghanistan are behind all the chaos in Balochistan.
summary: Pakistan needs to abandon the policy of rewarding those who attack Baloch nationalists and stop promoting conspiracy theories that India, Iran, and Afghanistan are behind all the chaos in Balochistan.

title: Common Food Dye Can Make Skin Temporarily Transparent: Report
content: Researchers at Stanford University were able to peer into the bodies of living animals as they discovered that a common food dye made their skin, muscle and connective tissues temporarily transparent.
summary: Researchers at Stanford University were able to peer into the bodies of living animals as they discovered that a common food dye made their skin, muscle and connective tissues temporarily transparent.
